name: Odyssey Moon
description:
Odyssey Moon is a classic SURVIVER style ARCADE game full of shooting and improvements, with great variations, full of characters with unique skills, where the player tries to improve the character to the maximum with his combinations. Cuddle up in the emptiness (maybe not so emptiness) of this fluffy moon in space.
There are several combinations that the player can achieve with the power ups collected after surviving waves and waves of enemies.



The scenery is made up of beautiful stars and stars, comets and large colored spots, and also has kittens.




There is a Combination Weapon and its variations to increase your power
  • 4 different levels with 30 variations of scenery, all colorful and pretty to the eye
  • 6 Weapons with different abilities that vary the gameplay of the game and how the player will behave towards enemies
  • More than 30 Power Ups with great variations where you can combine them to make them stronger, each with different levels
